name: tobit-spa-ai
description: Tobit SPA AI - Operations Orchestration Platform

scripts.test:security: cd apps/api && .venv/bin/pytest tests/test_security*.py tests/test_encryption.py tests/test_permissions.py tests/test_api_keys.py
scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "API,WORKER,WEB" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green" "cd apps/api && .venv/bin/python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000" "cd apps/api && .venv/bin/python run_worker.py" "cd apps/web && npm run dev:log"
